sentences.sentence: Conclusion Hypoglossal schwannoma is extremely rare.
sentences.translation: 结论舌下神经鞘瘤罕见。

sentences.sentence: Hypoglossal nerve injury was the most common injury (68.6%).
sentences.translation: 以舌下神经损伤最为多见(68.6%)。

sentences.sentence: The outer aperture of JF was adjacent to the hypoglossal canal.
sentences.translation: 颈静脉孔的外口与舌下神经管相毗邻。
